Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimatedRenderable
    Renderable that supports animations.
    Button
    A basic button.
    GUI
    Responsible for initializing the game look and feel, hooking up buttons to OS messages and running the main game loop.
    GUIThread
    Class that interacts with the OS messaging service in a different thread.
    ImageManager
    Object responsible for loading images.
    Particle
    A simple class that stores all the information about a particle.
    ParticleEmitter
    Object that creates and tracks particles for smoke/fog/spark effects in the game.
    RadioButton
    Controls the states of the buttons that get assigned to it.
    Renderable
    An object that stores all the info for the renderer to correctly display an image on the screen.
    Renderer
    Responsible for rendering images, text and particle emitters to a canvas.
    SideBar
    Object that creates and manages the sidebar.
    Text
    Text rendering facility.
    TextButton
    Acts like a regular Button, however it is also tied to a Text object.
    Timer
    Object responsible for tracking time that passes between the loop cycles.
    ToggleButton
    Acts like a regular Button, except that if it gets clicked it will stay in a pressed mode rather than idle or mouseOver.
    Window
    Creates a new window that can display a canvas object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Button.buttonState  
    SideBar.ViewState
